shortIntro.title: What This Game Needs to Run Smoothly
shortIntro.para1: PUBG Mobile is one of the most popular battle royale games on mobile. To enjoy smooth gameplay without lags or crashes, your device must meet certain minimum hardware and software requirements.
shortIntro.para2: Low-end devices can run the game at 30 FPS with reduced settings, while mid-range and high-end devices can achieve stable 60-90 FPS or higher with high graphics settings.

intro: Below are the official minimum and recommended specifications required to run PUBG Mobile smoothly on Android devices.

minimum.CPU: Snapdragon 435 / Exynos 7420 / MediaTek Helio P20 or equivalent

recommended.CPU: Snapdragon 675 / Exynos 8895 / Helio G90T or better

faqIntroText: Here are the most frequently asked questions about PUBG Mobile performance, device support, and optimization.

faqList.question: Can PUBG Mobile run on 2GB RAM devices?
faqList.answer: Yes, but expect lower FPS and reduced graphics. Optimal performance is achieved on devices with 4GB RAM or higher.

faqList.question: Does PUBG Mobile support high FPS modes?
faqList.answer: Yes, most modern mid-range and high-end devices support 60 FPS, and some high-end devices can achieve 90 FPS in supported regions.

faqList.question: How much internet speed is required?
faqList.answer: A stable connection of 2–5 Mbps is sufficient, but lower ping and higher bandwidth (4G/5G) provide smoother gameplay.
